title: Please sign in
description: We’re glad to see you again! To fully use the platform, please sign in — all features will become available. If you’re new here, registration takes just a few clicks.
magicTitle: The magic of direct renting is active
magicTextPrefix: Renterya is a space for honest renting. No agents. No schemes. No hidden fees.
magicTextMiddle: The platform is designed exclusively for direct interaction between property owners and renters. If you represent an agency or act as an intermediary, this service is not intended for you.
magicTextSuffix: We deliberately protect the Renterya community and reserve the right to
magicTextAfterLink: that violate the principles of direct renting.
